          <title>
            <string language="sl">Tropska Afrika - trditve</string>
            <string language="en">Tropical Africa - statements</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tropisches Afrika - Anweisungen</string>

          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Ugotavljanje pravilnosti trditev povezanih s tropsko Afriko.</string>

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Determinar a exatidão das indicações

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La determinazione della precisione delle

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθοριστικός την ακρίβεια των δηλώσεων σχετικών με την

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Determinando la corrección de las declaraciones
